title: Old Beautiful Buildings
Short Description: The kind of stuff, and what I like in Chicago.

locations.title: Dreihaus Museum
locations.short: People rich enough to make their house museums always build nice museums. Beautiful custom tiling, an ancient pull toilet, and a Tiffany glass dome adorn this mansion.

locations.title: Merchandise Mart
locations.short: The first building with its own zip code, it holds wondrous secrets: a magnificent tassel store, office furniture for sale, and a perfectly numbered staircase.

locations.title: Tribune Tower
locations.short: Tribune Tower has stones from around the world stuck into the building. Touch the whole world on a single city block.

locations.title: Chicago Riverwalk
locations.short: A cooler way to walk on a hot day, the Riverwalk is pretty nice for getting around. Don't take up the whole path.

locations.title: Jewler's Building
locations.short: This building had a working car elevator going up 23 floors.
